https://tmrev.io/movie/134640-Death in Charge 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t8cN51ORL2iqx07JiqK1cFr5qM3.jpg In the tradition of E.C. Horror Comics, this cautionary tale examines life through the eyes of Death who gets derailed when an impatient single Mom carelessly mistakes the scythe-carrying cloaked one for her tardy babysitter and leaves Death to care for her precocious 9-year-old daughter. Death in Charge
